title: McDavid goal helps Oilers beat Red Wings 3-1
text: EDMONTON, Alberta (AP) " Connor McDavid scored his fourth goal of the season to help the Edmonton Oilers beat the Detroit Red Wings 3-1 on Wednesday night.The...
